body.p: Entity A notes that the taxation authority’s decision on one transfer pricing matter would affect, or be affected by, the other transfer pricing matters. Applying paragraph 6 of IFRIC 23, Entity A concludes that considering the tax treatments of all transfer pricing matters in the jurisdiction together better predicts the resolution of the uncertainty. Entity A also concludes it is not probable that the taxation authority will accept the tax treatments. Consequently, Entity A reflects the effect of the uncertainty in determining its taxable profit applying paragraph 11 of IFRIC 23.
